Title: Blogging With Pelican - 1
Description:
I started blogging 5 years back and I had my first blog through wordpress. I hope most people would have started blogging either through wordpress (or) blogspot.

It is always fun to find new ways of doing things. This is where pelican + git + (github / gitlab) pages combo turns blogging as an activity that is enjoyable for people like me who want to get most of the things get done without leaving the Terminal.

I have also written a brief post about the advantages of blogging this way.

Note: At the end of this cast, after executing make devserver open your web browser and visit http://localhost:8000
